abstract: The activist investor raised his bid for Clorox on Wednesday to $10.7 billion, two days after the detergents company spurned his takeover offer as “neither credible nor adequate.”
snippet: The activist investor raised his bid for Clorox on Wednesday to $10.7 billion, two days after the detergents company spurned his takeover offer as “neither credible nor adequate.”

headline.main: Icahn Raises Bid for Clorox and Scolds Managers

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
